title: The Captain's Table Omnibus
description: A singlevolume collection of the Captain's tales includes the adventures of Kirk, Sulu, Picard, Sisko, Janeway, Calhoun, and Pike at their various helms, as chronicled by such notable authors as Diane Carey, Michael Jan Friedman, Jerry Oltion, Peter Daid, L. A. Graf, Dean WesleySmith, and Kristine Kathryn Rusch. Original.
author: L.A. Graf
